article.name: How can I stay up to date on Mackerel’s ongoing development?
article.title: How can I stay up to date on Mackerel’s ongoing development?
article.body:
If you have encountered a problem within Mackerel, it’s likely we are in the process of working to fix it. To see the latest information and updates about development, please follow us on X @mackerelio or subscribe to our Status Page.

You can receive status updates by registering your notification address using the 'SUBSCRIBE' button in the upper right corner of the Status Page.

The scope of influence of each item on the status page is as follows.

Component Name Impacted Features
Dashboard Viewing screens such as Custom Dashboards, Host Details, and Service Details on the Web Console
Org Management Viewing and managing organization information, plans, and billing on the Web Console
Account Management Viewing and managing user information
Metrics Metric posting and retrieval via API, viewing graphs on the Web Console
Monitoring Managing monitoring settings on the Web Console and API, monitoring and alert triggering (excluding External Monitoring and Anomaly Detection for roles)
Notification Managing notification channels on the Web Console and API, sending notifications
Host Management Managing services, roles, and hosts on the Web Console and API
AWS Integration Operations related to AWS Integration, including managing integration settings, host registration, and metric posting on the Web Console and API
Azure Integration Operations related to Azure Integration, including managing integration settings, host registration, and metric posting on the Web Console
GoogleCloud Integration Operations related to Google Cloud Integration, including managing integration settings, host registration, and metric posting on the Web Console
External URL Monitoring External monitoring and related metric posting
Anomaly Detection for roles Model training and monitoring for Anomaly Detection for roles
Mackerel for KCPS Communication between KDDI Cloud Platform Service (KCPS) environments and Mackerel servers
Documents Viewing the Mackerel website, help, API documentation, and FAQ
